content: carseat shoulder strap covers these shoulder strap covers protect baby s neck from being bitten by the sharp seat belt straps on the car seat and offer a cushy pad to nap against designed to fit 1 5 wide seatbelt straps skill level easy basic tunisian and regular crochet skills required materials sport or worsted weight yarn f 3 75mm hook 6 buttons about ½ inch diameter hookcandy com crochet pattern ©2009 sylvia schuchardt *note - this pattern uses american terminology contact hookcandy@gmail com follow the instructions below in the order written to make the covers instructions between stars *like so* are to be repeated as instructed abbreviations are defined at the end of the pattern and special instructions are be- low rtrn return yo pull through 1 loop *yo pull through 2 loops* across tks tunisian knit stitch *insert hook from front to back of fabric between the front and back vertical bar yo pull up loop* across bind off to bind off slip_stitch into the vertical bars 1 foundation row chain 21 beg 2nd chain frm hk pick up 20 loops across working into the bumps on the under- side of chain rtrn 2-18 forward tks across rtrn 19 bind off 20 chain 1 turn single_crochet 2 chain 3 skip the chain 3 single_crochet 8 chain 3 skip the chain 3 single_crochet 8 chain 3 skip the chain 3 single_crochet 2 21 turn slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 3 into chain 3 loop slip_stitch 8 single_crochet 3 into loop slip_stitch 8 single_crochet 3 into loop slip_stitch 2 22 continue to slip_stitch around the other left side bottom and right side edges end off sew 3 buttons onto the edge opposite the button loops abbreviations chain=chain sts=stitches slip_stitch=slip_stitch single_crochet=single_crochet frm=from hk=hook ea=each decrease=together beg=beginning this pattern is protected by copyright please do not sell or redistribute this pattern in any form selling the completed items made using this pattern is not permitted without express permission from the designer
